caption.p: Photograph for some Lagochilus species from Uzbekistan Flora ( A): L. inebrians Bunge, (B): L. nevskii Knorring, ( C): L. occultiflorus Rupr., ( D): L. olgae Kamelin, ( E): L. platycalyx Schrenk, ( F): L. proskorjakovii Ikramov, ( G): L. seravschanicus Knorring, ( H): L. setulosus Vved., ( I): L. vvedenskyi R. Kam. (Photos A, B, D, G are taken by Natalya Beshko, photos C, H are taken by Alim Gaziev, photo E is taken by Tulkin Tillaev, photos F, I are taken by Akbar Akhmedov).
